Class Node

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--Node
class Node
extends java.lang.Object

Node manager - load node definitions from the Lazy dictionary - manages the definition and node (instance) cache CURRENT LIMITATIONS - does not take into account the view definitions when computing the table --> node dependencies - should consider {db-connection}.{table} instead of {table}

static void OLDDependentNodes(java.lang.String modifiedObject)
          Invalidate (remove) cached nodes that depend on the modified object (table)
static java.lang.String ResetNodeDependencies()
          OBSOLETE Rebuild the node --> table dependencies and store them into the LAZY_NODE_TABLE_DEP table There is a dependency N --> T iff table T appears in the "from" clause of node N (which is stored in the COLLECTION attribute of table NODES) Limitation: does not take into account view definitions

ResetNodeDependencies

public static java.lang.String ResetNodeDependencies()
OBSOLETE Rebuild the node --> table dependencies and store them into the LAZY_NODE_TABLE_DEP table There is a dependency N --> T iff table T appears in the "from" clause of node N (which is stored in the COLLECTION attribute of table NODES) Limitation: does not take into account view definitions
